Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class TurnController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.TurnController
public class TurnController
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the link between player in turn and the game. Its main aim is to ensure messages correctness and filter those related to the game not coming from player in turn, in order to avoid trivial calls over the model. This, together with GameController, represents the Controller of the MVC Architectural pattern.

  • Constructor Details

    • TurnController

      public TurnController​(Game model, Player firstPlayer)
      Constructor that initialize all the attributes.
      Parameters:
      model - , instance of the game to which turn controller is related.
      firstPlayer - , player in turn at the beginning of the match.

  • Method Details

    • handleBuyDevCardMessage

      public void handleBuyDevCardMessage​(BuyDevCardMessage message, RemoteView sender)
      Dispatches an action of buying development card type to the model. It only accepts messages from player involved in the turn and then makes an inspection of the message itself. After ensuring a sort of high level correctness, It establishes how the model will notify remote views about any error occurred.
      Parameters:
      message - message containing instruction on how to perform buy development card action.
      sender - remote view that forwards the message.

    • handleActivateProductionMessage

      public void handleActivateProductionMessage​(ActivateProductionMessage message, RemoteView sender)
      Dispatches an activate production action to the model. It only accepts messages from player involved in the turn and then makes an inspection of the message itself. After ensuring a sort of high level correctness, It catches exceptions if any error occurred and, in this case, it establishes how the model will notify remote views.
      Parameters:
      message - message containing instructions on how to perform an activate production action.
      sender - remote view that forwards the message.

    • handleTakeResourcesFromMarketMessage

      public void handleTakeResourcesFromMarketMessage​(TakeResourcesFromMarketMessage message, RemoteView sender)
      Dispatches a take resources from market action to the model. If needed all the exceptional flows are caught and they are handled. It catches exceptions if any error occurred and, in this case, it establishes how the model will notify remote views. NeedPositioningException is handled in a different way because if it is thrown basically means that the model requires further action from the player.
      Parameters:
      message - message containing information on how to perform the action.
      sender - remote view that forwards the message.

    • handleLeaderActionMessage

      public void handleLeaderActionMessage​(LeaderActionMessage message, RemoteView sender)
      Dispatches a leader action to the model after a message validity check. If any exception is thrown,, it establishes how the model will notify remote views.
      Parameters:
      message - message containing instructions on how to perform the action.
      sender - remote view that forwards the message.

    • handleMoveMessage

      public void handleMoveMessage​(MoveResourcesMessage message, RemoteView sender)
      Dispatches a move action to the model. If any exception is thrown, it establishes how the model will notify remote views.
      Parameters:
      message - message containing instructions on how to perform a move action
      sender - remote view that forwards the message

    • handlePositioningMessage

      public void handlePositioningMessage​(PositioningMessage message, RemoteView sender)
      Dispatches a positioning action to the model. This can happen after that a NeedPositioningException is thrown while performing a take resources from market, so the player has to settle his pending resources, that's why it checks if the model is in a take resources from market phase. If any exception is thrown, it establishes how the model will notify remote views.
      Parameters:
      message - message containing instructions on how to settle each resource.
      sender - remote view that forwards the message.

    • handleEndTurnMessage

      public void handleEndTurnMessage​(EndTurnMessage message, RemoteView sender)
      Dispatches an end turn action to the model after being assured that a normal action has been done.
      Parameters:
      message - message triggered by player when he wants to close the turn.
      sender - remote view that forwards the message.

    • handlePlayerReconnection

      public void handlePlayerReconnection​(User reconnectingUser)
      This method alerts the model that an user is attempting to reconnect.
      Parameters:
      reconnectingUser - user that wants to join the same game.

    • handlePlayerDisconnection

      public void handlePlayerDisconnection​(User disconnectingUser)
      This method alerts the model that an user has just disconnected.
      Parameters:
      disconnectingUser - user that lost the connection.

    • isSenderTurn

      private boolean isSenderTurn​(Player sender)
      Boolean method the tells if the player how has just sent a message is the player in turn.
